tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I have been consulting with Dr. Renu multiple times for issues like abscess, fever, diarrhoea etc 

She was always very patient, approachable, responsive and helped me recover. 

One time I was away in a trek in Himalayas in a remote place around Manali and had to video call her with my health issue. She took care of me very warmly for days because I had no access to medicines or doctors and helped me recover. Even after I got back home, she checked in on me to help with my recovery and advised. 

I owe her one for everything she did

tags: None
review: Consulted for fever, cough and body pain. We hadn’t expected it to be dengue but doctor recommended a dengue test and it turned out to be dengue! We did the follow up consultation on the phone which the doctor readily agreed to. The report showed inordinate levels of HbA1c which she also discussed and laid out some recommendation about.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been going to Dr. Renu on multiple occasions since last year and I have been very happy with the service and the diagnosis. Highly recommended!

tags: None
review: Diagnosis was excellent. You get to know her experience with the right questions she asks and tells you accurately why it could have happened. Very nice experience. Excellent treatment. Will finish the course of medicine and will be able to tell you better. Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: "When you are tired of knocking all the doors, then you knock the door of God" is what I say Dr. Renu. She is my family physician since last 5 years and what not she has treated me for. She is an extremely friendly, understanding and experienced doctor. She will prescribe medicines which are not too high for the patient, still they will do magic. The most important thing about her is, she gives you cadence over phone call and you can visit her home even 10 PM in the night, in case of emergency. She is absolutely brilliant, I am blessed to know her.
